insert into yb_fj_project_clue_onsite_dtl(clue_dtl_id, project_id, project_org_id, clue_id, orgname, visitid, doctorname, deptname, visittype, clientname, sex, visitdate, leavedate, yearage, dis, his_itemname, itemname, chargeattri, sl, fy, create_time, create_username, create_user, itemclass, `year`, insure_no, idcard, company_addr, orgcode, org_region, settlement_time, zy_days, client_type, offsite_type, insured_region, totalfee, fundpay, dbpay, acctpay, fee_deptname, fee_doctorname, his_itemcode, itemcode, chargedate, chargeclass, selfpay_prop, itemprice, wg_fee) select clue_dtl_id, project_id, project_org_id, clue_id, orgname, visitid, doctorname, deptname, visittype, clientname, sex, visitdate, leavedate, yearage, dis, his_itemname, itemname, chargeattri, sl, fy, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemclass, `year`, insure_no, idcard, company_addr, orgcode, org_region, settlement_time, zy_days, client_type, offsite_type, insured_region, totalfee, fundpay, dbpay, acctpay, fee_deptname, fee_doctorname, his_itemcode, itemcode, chargedate, chargeclass, selfpay_prop, itemprice, wg_fee from yb_fj_project_clue_dtl where clue_id in
#{item}
